function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases through the use of ontologies and query interfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict access controls and privacy measures for ontology databases and query interfaces","Technologies":"Access control technologies, encryption, and secure data transfer protocols","People":"Developers, researchers, and database administrators","Owner":"Institutional administrators, database managers, and IT security teams"},{"Description":"Use of ontologies to model disease aspects can lead to unintentional release of sensitive information","Impact":"Privacy breaches, compromised data security, and potential misuse of sensitive disease-related information","Mitigation":"Anonymization of sensitive data, regular security audits, and adherence to data privacy regulations","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, encryption, and secure data storage systems","People":"Data scientists, ontology developers, and database administrators","Owner":"Data privacy officers, security compliance teams, and institutional administrators"},{"Description":"Integration of ontologies and query interfaces could lead to unintended exposure of disease-related data","Impact":"Increased risk of unauthorized access, data breaches, and exploitation of disease-related vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Regular security testing, access control policies, and encryption of sensitive data","Technologies":"Security testing tools, access control systems, and data encryption technologies","People":"Ontologists, software developers, and security specialists","Owner":"Database administrators, IT security teams, and institutional risk management teams"}]}
